P

peashooter - Variable in class view.View
A Peashooter option on the pop-up menu
peaShooter - Variable in class test.PeashooterTest
The PeaShooter Piece Object that is analysed
Peashooter - Class in model
The Peashooter class provides the PlantsVSZombie game with a single Piece type that once called can create a Peashooter Piece in of itself.
Peashooter() - Constructor for class model.Peashooter
Creates a Peashooter with 5 health, 2 attack damage and 20 cost value.
Peashooter(String, char, int, int, int) - Constructor for class model.Peashooter
 
PeashooterTest - Class in test
The Test Class for the PEASHOOTER (Piece SubClass)
PeashooterTest() - Constructor for class test.PeashooterTest
 
Piece - Class in model
The Piece class provides the PlantsVSZombie game with the appropriate pieces that populate squares on the game board and perform certain actions that help or hinder the player in their pursuit to win the game.
Piece(String, char, int, int, int) - Constructor for class model.Piece
A constructor for the class Piece that takes the String name, character shortName, integer health, integer attack, integer cost of a Piece object and creates it.
PieceTest - Class in test
The TEST Class for the Piece
PieceTest() - Constructor for class test.PieceTest
 
popupMenu - Variable in class view.View
A pop-up menu to allow the user select which plant to place on the board
position - Variable in class model.Square
The Coordinates of the square object
purchasePiece(Piece) - Method in class controller.Controller
To see if the user is able to purchase a new piece.
